name: David JonBoy Smith
text: So I had this internet coupon right. And I orderd for the coupon listing a medium specialty pan pizza and a medium 1 topping pizza with a salad a drink and an order of 10 chicken wings. Coupon was $26.99 plus delivery fee and tax. With a $4 ‚Ä¶More

name: Nick Maddalena
text: 30 minutes past my online order arrival date and still waiting. I placed the order at 2:30 with a set delivery date of 6:30. I called at 7 and it still hadn't left the building. I called and was placed on hold, only to be told it had just left the oven.

name: Erin Grinstead
text: Great pizza and even better customer service! We are from out of town and have eaten dinner here 2 nights in a row! We will definitely eat here next time we are in town!!

name: Will S
text: Good pizza.  Staff seemed down to earth enough, which is mandatory for a pizza joint.  You can tell nothing's is frozen.  Cheese bread things are meh.

name: ADANNA AMARE
text: Delicious, juicy, mouth watering pizza that you won't find anywhere else!! Not to mention they appreciate their long time customers with constant gifts and discounts. They show they enjoy sserving their customers and that's what comforts me the most!

name: Lizzy gaming
text: Snowiest day of the season! I called ahead to see what the delivery situation was... the guy who answered said they were running at least an hour/hour and a half. No problem, I‚Äôll pick up. He asked that I place it online, they said it will ‚Ä¶More

name: Oak TreeHopper
text:
great pizza and cheese bread
faster than they said it would be

name: K.N
text:
When calling to ask a few questions about the menu, the cashier was very nice and patient with me. Great serviceüëçüèæ Let‚Äôs see if the food is any good.
Edit: it was good!

name: Beth McClearen
text: Excellent pizza - quick and fast delivery.  It is locally owned - it's nice to support a small business.

name: Clinton Colorado
text: Fast and friendly service from the person at the counter. My pizza was read and correct at the time they said it would be. I was pleased to learn they still offer crushed red peppers and Parmesan. Some of the other chains have stopped.

name: Jeff Scott Ruiz
text: Always great pizza here, but one huge caveat: If you try to place a delivery order 30-45 minutes before they close, whether online or by phone, they will NOT deliver to you. By comparison, If you walk into a restaurant 15 minutes before ‚Ä¶More

name: Norm Solomon
text: Quick and tasty. Friendly staff

name: Marie
text: Pointless to order what you actually want they‚Äôll just bring you whatever!

name: Ben M
text: I'm back to Blackjack. Just moved to Lonetree and this Blackjack is solid. Loved Blackjack when I lived in Sheridan. Highlands Ranch didn't live up so I switched to Jet's over there. Awesome to have a great Blackjack's again. Pizza is always great and the staff is super cool. Good to be a regular again.

name: Yevgeniy Mitilev
text: Bomb pizza at a good price

name: Devin Birocci
text: I have eaten Blackjack in 5 different locations in the Denver area. The cheese-bread is what I love to get and this location specifically is by far the worst location for cheese-bread. I have ordered extra extra cheese and paid an extra ‚Ä¶More

name: Ozima OW
text: The pizza is inconsistent. Recently got a pan pizza that had tough, non-crispy dough. I always have to order it well done because they undercook it every time.

name: Chantel Hicks
text: Pizza is ok. Dominos & Pizza Hut taste better. Wings are gross, they are the ones that come frozen in a bag.

name: James Parsons
text: My favorite pizza in DTC price and quality

name: Let it Be
text: My husband and I have always had great experiences here.  There was one screw up one time  and my husband called and they made it right. We usually get two pizzas and a salad and they are very good. Usually tip 5 bucks to the delivery ‚Ä¶More

name: Manda Panda Kitty
text: Order a gluten-free pizza with pepperoni and pineapple. Didn't get the pineapple. Didn't get the pepperoni. Praying its gluten-free at least. We didn't order GF because we want too, we ordered it because wheat kills us. Also they have false ‚Ä¶More

name: JULIO LOPEZ
text: I order a pizza for pick up as soon as a arrived I felt very welcome by everyone in the staff. All three of the employees are awesome!

name: Julia Bierylo
text: My favorite pizza place. Polite workers, delicious pizza, and great deals. Their ranch is amazing!!!!!

name: Brittney Hargraves
text: Anyone with anything bad to say about this place is an impatient ninny-muggins!!! Hands down the BEST pizza with the BEST staff! ALWAYS friendly and helpful! KEITHA IS THE BEST ZA!!! but seriously, we order from here at least once a week ‚Ä¶More

name: Mr Arroyo
text: Absolutely great pizza, good price's....

name: keith ray
text: Best pizza in Colorado. The crust was perfect and the sauce was just right. I am not sure what all the negative reviews are but maybe it was the staff that night. When I went there I had no problems. All and all great experience I will most definitely come back to this location.

name: Crystal Monroe
text: Delicious local pizza shop. So glad we found this gem while visiting Denver!

name: Derek Murray
text: First time having Black Jack's and I was really impressed with their New York style pie.

name: Val
text: One of my fav places to get pizza. Especially pan pizza. Love their ranch dressing

name: Jeremy Howen
text: Had a issue with the order manager sent out new food and it was awesome. Thanks guys

name: Gypsy Jones
text: The one in Pueblo CO is better they actually have specials

name: 30 Seconds of Awesome !
text: Sent me a pizza with rancid olives. Refused to refund my money. GROSS

name: Oren Schmidt
text: The Pizza is great, affordable and quick! We ordered a huge delivery for our office and it was delivered to the door in less than 45 minutes! great customer service, the staff and ownership is very friendly. Did i mention that the pizza is hot, tasty and affordable? ;)

name: Robin Wang
text: Reckless delivery driver in infinite sedan almost caused major accident during rush hour.  Unacceptable

name: Wesley Gallegos
text: The web did not work so I had to call and the guy on the phone kept putting on hold. Ver bad customer service. Hopefully the dilivery is great you will see pictures whe the pizza and wings have arrived

name: Brian Meier
text: Tasty food and very good customer service!

name: Jason Buchanan
text: Amazing service, extremely polite and professional. I will order from this place anytime I'm in town

name: Ryan Mull
text: This place is awesome. Pizza was great, service was fast and friendly. The prices were really good too. We will definitely be ordering more from Blackhack... Highly recommend it!

name: Barry Long
text: Always our "go-to" dinner. We get Blackjack at least twice a month and have never had a bad experience.  Best pizza of the big chains/franchise and best deals.  Pleasant staff.

name: Eric Lamey
text:
Love your pizza guys but no credit/debit cards?

The person on the phone said "Can't take credit best HE can do is $18.00 cash, ‚Ä¶More

name: William Ames
text: Pizza took an hour and 15 minutes after being told 30 to 40.  Order was wrong and cold.  I have been a black jack fan for over 10 years but the service keeps getting worse.

name: Pamela Parker-Masi
text: Too much sauce and cheese when I didn't ask for it...dough was floppy and soggy in the middle...when my kids went to pick up the slice the topping just slid off.   And it was a bit irritating to order because I was given a lot of different ‚Ä¶More

name: Travis Nelson
text: Ordered online got an email confirmation that my order went through and my food was being made. Waited for hour an a half, when my food didn't come I called and they said my order "fell through the cracks". Too bad because I used to love their Mediterranean pizza..

name: Justin McGee
text: Good pizza but consistently late with deliveries

name: Sun Enck
text: They delivered quicker than expected, order was exactly right, food was hot, salad was special order and delicious. Delivery driver was nice to my beagle üòä

name: Colo Gal
text: The best pizza out there.  The prices don't reflect just how delicious it is.  I think that they are better than even the pricey pizzas.

name: Jesse Kinsey
text: Best pizza in town.

name: Alex Cole
text: EXCELLENT. Have always had a pleasant experience with Blackjack. Last night, the manager carried my pizzas to my car for me because my arm was in a sling. I didn't ask, he just insisted on giving good customer service. Much appreciated too.

name: B D
text: Pizza was undercooked and the delivery person must have carried it on its side because it was all smushed to one side.  Got coupons in the mail that expire the 28th and ordered on the 16th, they dont work online even though its within the ‚Ä¶More

name: Desiree Bowlus
text: Ordered regular crust, received thinner crust than a quarter.. Soggy in the center...Bland sauce... Ingredients were unevenly dispersed, some slices overloaded and some almost bare... Ordered a good deal.  Worse than Pudge Bros whom had ‚Ä¶More

name: Scott Bacon
text: Worst inside experience, went in for a salad, guy was rude when I asked for a chef salad (I guess the stores don't all have the same menu items) I selected one they did have and went to pay. "we don't take credit cards for amounts under $10". I told him to add soda until I hit 10, paid and left the soda on the counter.

name: Kevin Mory
text: BORING  - WORST PIZZA I have had in a long long time. I ordered a 3 topping pizza and salad - I was told there is a cash price and a card price... Hmmmm  anyway as I said it is TERRIBLE PLAIN PIZZA  I asked that it be cut in squares not ‚Ä¶More

name: Soledad Vicuna
text: When giving the driver money for the pizza he said, "will I be getting a tip or am I barking up the wrong tree". This isnt the first time this same exact driver has made rude comments. Even with that being said, still gave the driver a tip. ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Cafarella
text: They don't carry paper plates. They don't have packets of cheese or crushed red peppers. This place sucks

name: Rafael Cruz
text: Best I had in Denver so far

name: Kid to Kid Aurora
text: They don't take credit cards. I guess the owner wants to trade pelts or shimmery rocks.

name: Sean D
text: Called to place a order the guy who took the order was very short tempered and seemed inconvenienced that I was placing a order when I told him this he said well your calling right before open I asked if there was a manager and he said he ‚Ä¶More

name: Blake Pilgreen
text: Great pizza, great friendly service. I like this location.

name: alamon defield
text: Great pizza from good peoples.

name: Reesy Jackson
text: Great pizza!!!!!

name: S Baker
text: Dude!!! These guy's know how to make a pizza. Can't beat the price either!

name: luis cano
text: Good service,  good people!!

name: Billie Butler
text: Was not happy with the pizza here. Did like that they had ice cream :)

name: Dad E DuBose
text: Very pricey very plain tasting pizza and wings. Not at all what I expected.

name: Ben Lohr
text: Delicious

name: Lara Fortunato
text: Served raw pizza! Manager Al rude! Going to be contacting the health department regarding this! Refused a refund!

name: Nawal Ahmed
text: I like thier pizza my favorite pizza place ever

name: Laura Hardy
text: Great pizza

name: Andrew Anderson
